item.title: Green Army – Cotton canvas beanbag – classic sack shape
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: Green Army designed cotton canvas beanbag is the perfect furniture addition to any basement, family room, dorm, or bedroom whether as a gaming chair or a study spot – Bean
item.content:encoded:
Green Army designed cotton canvas beanbag is the perfect furniture addition to any basement, family room, dorm, or bedroom whether as a gaming chair or a study spot
– Bean bag cover: the removable double stitched cotton canvas cover is soft to the touch, machine washable, and resistant to water, stains, and discoloration for easy maintenance.
– Pack contents: 1 bean bag cover with bean
– Tough, stain resistant, easily cleaned with damp cloth, and waterproof ballistic fabric
